sentences.sentence: The experiment proved the good result of hyphal fragment separation.
sentences.translation: 实验证明，菌丝片段分离法效果良好。

sentences.sentence: Hyphal form of Candida albicans was thought to be the appropriate object of medical mycology.
sentences.translation: 白念珠菌的菌丝相细胞是进行其病原真菌学研究的适宜研究对象。

sentences.sentence: Objective To study the effect of serum on promoter activity of Candida albicans yeast-hyphal regulational gene(HYR1).
sentences.translation: 目的探讨血清对白念珠菌菌相转换特异基因HYR1上游启动子活性的影响。
